text: The ambassador of the United States to Japan (Japanese: 日本駐在アメリカ合衆国大使, Hepburn: Nihon Chūzai Amerika Gasshūkoku Taishi) is the highest ranking official from the United States to Japan. Rahm Emanuel was the 32nd and most recently confirmed United States ambassador to Japan, in office from 2022 to 2025. == References == *Japan ambassadors ambassadors
title: List of ambassadors of the United States to Japan
